help_parental_control_parental_control.lang_hpcpc1: As part of Linksys Connect, Parental Controls can restrict Internet access for up to five computers or devices. You can block Internet access or limit it to specific times, and you can also block specific websites.
help_parental_control_parental_control.lang_hpcpc2: Note: After you have made your changes, click Save Settings to apply your changes.
help_parental_control_parental_control.lang_hpcpc5: To restrict Internet access of computers or devices in your local network, select Enabled.
help_parental_control_parental_control.lang_hpcpc8: The list displays the computers affected by Parental Controls.
help_parental_control_parental_control.lang_hpcpc10: If you want to apply Parental Controls to more computers, click Add.
help_parental_control_parental_control.lang_hpcpc12: If you no longer want to apply Parental Controls to a device, select it and click Remove.
help_parental_control_parental_control.lang_hpcpc14: To change the name of a device, select it and click Rename.
help_parental_control_parental_control.lang_hpcpc16: Specify when Internet access is blocked.
help_parental_control_parental_control.lang_hpcpc18: To never block Internet access, select Never.
help_parental_control_parental_control.lang_hpcpc19: To always block Internet access, select Always.
help_parental_control_parental_control.lang_hpcpc20: To specify days and times when Internet access is blocked, select Specific times.
help_parental_control_parental_control.lang_hpcpc23: In each field, enter a website address that you want to block.
help_parental_control_parental_control.lang_hpcpc24: Note: For more information, refer to the online User Guide at www.linksys.com.
